name: Re:Box
description:
The Mastermind Evil Overlord Villain (...let's just call him M.E.O.W.) wants to unleash the apocalypse by opening the Pandora's box! But the box has puzzles on it, and he's too dumb! So M.E.O.W. traps you, a random passerby, in a time loop, forcing you to solve the puzzles for him! Every time you don't solve a puzzle in 40 seconds, time gets reset! Will you be able to solve them all?

Made in 5 days during LM0B Beginners Game Jam #19.

How to play:
Playing in fullscreen is recommended!

Pentomino Puzzle: Hold left click to drag pieces, click right to rotate, click left to insert a piece. Make every piece fit in the box before time runs out!

Cat Puzzle: DO THIS LAST! Use left click and put the colored pieces in the correct locations, while also minding the cat!. Finishing four puzzles will unlock extra time for this puzzle

Button Puzzle: Click on the buttons and find the correct sequence before time runs out! The sequence does not change, only the location of the buttons. Therefore, taking notes using pen and paper is highly recommended!

Bottle Puzzle: Use left click to match the color of the bottles with the liquids! The leftmost bottle must be empty!

Maze: Use WASD buttons to navigate the ball and make it to the exit in time!

Install instructions: Download the zip file, extract it, and click on the .exe file to play!
